issue.title: [CI] Ubuntu 14.04 test is failed by user defined literal
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7260](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7260). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/5329

```

  /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/dataset/filter_test.cc:80:194: error: invalid suffix on literal; C++11 requires a space between literal and identifier [-Werror=literal-suffix]
     ASSERT_EQ("a"_.ToString(), "a");
                  ^
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7260?focusedCommentId=16983047) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5901
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5901>
